project.description: Volatility - Step 2 - Analyze Process DLLs and Handles

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MEMORY_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Pat of the raw memory image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the location of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_PROFILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the profile of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build output paths.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the evidence processing output

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify extra arguments to pass to volatility

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [[ ! -d $OUTPUT_LOCATION ]]; then mkdir $OUTPUT_LOCATION || true; fi vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} mac_lsof >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mac_lsof_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} mac_list_files >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mac_list_files_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} mac_dyld_maps >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mac_dyld_maps_output
vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} mac_bash >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mac_bash_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} mac_bash_env >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mac_bash_env_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} mac_bash_hash >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mac_bash_hash_output
#vol.py getsids >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/getsids_output #vol.py handles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/handles_output #vol.py filescan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/filescan_output #vol.py mutantscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mutantscan_output #vol.py svcscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/svcscan_output #vol.py cmdscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/cmdscan_output #vol.py consoles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/consoles_output
